projects.title: Bookmarks Archive
projects.slogan: Organize your web links with ease
projects.description:
Bookmarks Archive is a desktop application that allows users to store and organize their browser bookmarks. This application was created with the aim of simplifying the process of managing browser bookmarks and making them more accessible.

With Bookmarks Archive, users can easily export bookmarks from their Chrome browser and import them into the application. From there, they can add multiple tags to each bookmark, making it easier to organize them and find the information they need.

For users who want to save data to the cloud Bookmarks Archive offers an easy solution. By moving the bookmarks data file into a folder of a cloud service like Dropbox.
projects.technologies: Technologies: Electron, Vite, React, Redux Toolkit, TypeScript, Bootstrap, Styled Components

projects.title: Contextify
projects.slogan: Translate, rephrase, and understand context like never before
projects.description:
Contextify is an advanced language translation and contextual understanding app that is built on the latest technologies from OpenAI and Azure Speech Service. With Contextify, you can translate any text in any language and understand its meaning in real-time.

The app is built on an Electron platform, which makes it easy to use and accessible across all desktop platforms. To use the app, simply copy the text you want to translate and paste it into the app's text area. Once your text is pasted into the app, you can easily select any word or phrase that you want to understand better. Contextify provides a comprehensive range of information about the selected word or phrase, including its translation, transcription, rephrased context, and usage examples.

Contextify is also equipped with Azure Speech Service, which means that you can use the app to listen to word or sentence in the original language. Simply click the speaker icon next to the word or sentence to hear it pronounced.

The app also allows you to switch between languages effortlessly, making it the perfect tool for anyone who needs to work with multiple languages on a regular basis. With Contextify, breaking down language barriers has never been easier.
projects.technologies: Technologies: OpenAI, Azure Speech Service, Electron, Vite, React, Redux Toolkit, TypeScript
